languages.text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary
The wearer is always slowed but immune to the {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} effect.
Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the wearer's melee attacks fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 turn if they fail a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Check|c9279ededcda42f58f38dda7b6a16946} penalty. If passed, the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 turn instead.

traits.locale_text:
Requires Hereticus — Votary
The wearer is always {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}slowed{/g} but immune to the {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}.
Targets {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hit{/g} by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attacks{/g} fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} if they fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −<u>(5 × Hereticus rank)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. If passed, the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 turn instead.

Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary
The wearer is always slowed but immune to the {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} effect.
Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the wearer's melee attacks fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 turn if they fail a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −<u>(5 × Heretical rank)</u> penalty. If passed, the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 turn instead.

Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary
The wearer is always slowed but immune to the {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} effect.
Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the wearer's melee attacks fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 turn if they fail a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Check|c9279ededcda42f58f38dda7b6a16946} penalty. If passed, the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 turn instead.

languages.text:
需要信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}异端主义{/g}——信奉者
装备者始终处于减速状态，但对{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}效果免疫。
装备的使用近战攻击{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}敌人时，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受{uip|Check|c9279ededcda42f58f38dda7b6a16946}减值。若目标未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态，持续1回合。如果目标通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态，持续1回合。
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary
The wearer is always slowed but immune to the {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} effect.
Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the wearer's melee attacks fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 turn if they fail a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Check|c9279ededcda42f58f38dda7b6a16946} penalty. If passed, the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 turn instead.

traits.locale_text:
需要信念：异端主义——信奉者
装备者始终处于{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}减速{/g}状态，但对{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}免疫。
装备的使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}敌人时，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受<u>（5×装备者“异端主义”等级）</u>{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}俯卧{/g}状态，持续1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。如果目标通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态，持续1回合。

需要信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}异端主义{/g}——信奉者
装备者始终处于{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}减速{/g}状态，但对{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}免疫。
装备的使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}敌人时，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受{uip|Check|c9279ededcda42f58f38dda7b6a16946}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态，持续1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。如果目标通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态，持续1回合。

languages.text:
Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Еретик{/g} — поборник
Персонаж всегда замедлен, но получает иммунитет к {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиживанию{/g}.
Цели, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} от персонажа в ближнем бою, выполняют проверку Выносливости на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|Check|c9279ededcda42f58f38dda7b6a16946} и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуты{/g} на 1 ход. В случае успеха цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедление{/g} на 1 ход.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary
The wearer is always slowed but immune to the {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} effect.
Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the wearer's melee attacks fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 turn if they fail a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Check|c9279ededcda42f58f38dda7b6a16946} penalty. If passed, the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 turn instead.

traits.locale_text:
Требуется: Скверна — поборник
Персонаж всегда замедлен, но получает иммунитет к обездвиживанию.
Цели, получившие попадание от персонажа в ближнем бою, выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −<u>(5 × уровень Скверны)</u> и в случае провала оказываются опрокинуты на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. В случае успеха цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедление{/g} на 1 ход.

Требуется: Скверна — поборник
Персонаж всегда замедлен, но получает иммунитет к обездвиживанию.
Цели, получившие попадание от персонажа в ближнем бою, выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −<u>(5 × уровень Скверны)</u> и в случае провала оказываются опрокинуты на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. В случае успеха цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедление{/g} на 1 ход.

Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Еретик{/g} — поборник
Персонаж всегда замедлен, но получает иммунитет к {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиживанию{/g}.
Цели, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} от персонажа в ближнем бою, выполняют проверку Выносливости на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|Check|c9279ededcda42f58f38dda7b6a16946} и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуты{/g} на 1 ход. В случае успеха цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедление{/g} на 1 ход.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}異端者{/g} ― 信奉者が必要
使用者は常に速度低下するが、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}効果は受けない。
使用者の近接攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}したターゲットは、{uip|Check|c9279ededcda42f58f38dda7b6a16946}のペナルティで耐久力{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に合格できない場合、1ターンの間{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}状態に陥る。合格できた場合、ターゲットは1ターンの間、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}速度低下{/g}状態となる。

The wearer is always {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}slowed{/g} but immune to the {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}.
Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} if they fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −<u>(5 × Heretical rank)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. If passed, the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 turn instead.

traits.locale_text:
異端者 ― 信奉者が必要
使用者は常に{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}速度低下{/g}するが、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}は受けない。
使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}したターゲットは、<u>(5 × 異端者レベル)</u>{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}のペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に合格できない場合、1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}状態に陥る。合格できた場合、ターゲットは1ターンの間、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}速度低下{/g}状態となる。

{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}異端者{/g} ― 信奉者が必要
使用者は常に{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}速度低下{/g}するが、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}は受けない。
使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}したターゲットは、{uip|Check|c9279ededcda42f58f38dda7b6a16946}の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に合格できない場合、1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}状態に陥る。合格できた場合、ターゲットは1ターンの間、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}速度低下{/g}状態となる。

languages.text:
Requiere {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hereje{/g}: Devoto
El portador siempre estará ralentizado, pero es inmune al efecto de {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g} .
Los objetivos {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactados{/g} por los ataques cuerpo a cuerpo del portador quedan {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribados{/g} durante 1 turno si fallan una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de Resistencia con una penalización de −{uip|Check|c9279ededcda42f58f38dda7b6a16946}. En el caso de que la supere, el objetivo queda {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g} durante 1 turno.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary
The wearer is always slowed but immune to the {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} effect.
Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the wearer's melee attacks fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 turn if they fail a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Check|c9279ededcda42f58f38dda7b6a16946} penalty. If passed, the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 turn instead.

traits.locale_text:
Requiere Hereticus: Devoto
El portador siempre estará {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}ralentizado{/g}, pero es inmune al {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g} .
Los objetivos {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impactados{/g} por los {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} del portador quedan {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribados{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} si fallan una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −<u>(5 × nivel de Hereticus)</u>. En el caso de que la superen, el objetivo queda {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g} durante 1 turno.

Requiere {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hereje{/g}: Devoto
El portador siempre estará {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}ralentizado{/g}, pero es inmune al {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g} .
Los objetivos {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactados{/g} por los {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} del portador quedan {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribados{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} si fallan una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −{uip|Check|c9279ededcda42f58f38dda7b6a16946}. En el caso de que la supere, el objetivo queda {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g} durante 1 turno.

languages.text:
Erfordert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Ketzer{/g} – Geweihter
Der Träger ist immer verlangsamt, aber immun gegen den Effekt {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Gelähmt{/g}.
Von Nahkampfangriffen des Trägers {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffene{/g} Ziele werden für 1 Zug {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g}, wenn sie eine Zähigkeits-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem Abzug von −{uip|Check|c9279ededcda42f58f38dda7b6a16946} nicht bestehen. Bei Bestehen wird das Ziel stattdessen für 1 Zug {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary
The wearer is always slowed but immune to the {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} effect.
Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the wearer's melee attacks fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 turn if they fail a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Check|c9279ededcda42f58f38dda7b6a16946} penalty. If passed, the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 turn instead.

traits.locale_text:
Erfordert Haereticus – Geweihter
Der Träger ist immer {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}Verlangsamt{/g}, aber immun gegen den {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Gelähmt{/g}.
Von {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriffen{/g} des Trägers {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}getroffene{/g} Ziele werden 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g}, wenn sie eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeits{/g}-Widerstands{g|Encyclopedia:Test}probe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -<u>(5 × Haereticus-Stufe)</u> nicht bestehen. Bei Bestehen wird das Ziel stattdessen 1 Zug lang {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g}.

Erfordert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Ketzer{/g} – Geweihter
Der Träger ist immer {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}verlangsamt{/g}, aber immun gegen den {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekt{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Gelähmt{/g}.
Von {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffen{/g} des Trägers {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffene{/g} Ziele werden für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g}, wenn sie eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeits{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −{uip|Check|c9279ededcda42f58f38dda7b6a16946} nicht bestehen. Bei Bestehen wird das Ziel stattdessen für 1 Zug {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g}.

languages.text:
Requiert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hérétique{/g} — Disciple.
L'utilisateur subit toujours l'effet Ralentissement mais est invulnérable à l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}.
Les cibles {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchées{/g} par les attaques de mêlée de l'utilisateur subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} pendant 1 tour si elles échouent à un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} lié à l'Endurance avec une pénalité de −{uip|Check|c9279ededcda42f58f38dda7b6a16946}. Si elles réussissent ce test, les cibles subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} pendant 1 tour.

Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary
The wearer is always slowed but immune to the {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} effect.
Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the wearer's melee attacks fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 turn if they fail a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Check|c9279ededcda42f58f38dda7b6a16946} penalty. If passed, the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 turn instead.

traits.locale_text:
Requiert Hereticus — Disciple.
L'utilisateur subit toujours l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}Ralentissement{/g} mais est invulnérable à l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}.
Les cibles {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touchées{/g} par les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaques de mêlée{/g} de l'utilisateur subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} si elles échouent à un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -<u>(5 × niveau Hereticus)</u>. Si elles réussissent ce test, les cibles subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} pendant 1 tour.

Requiert Hereticus — Disciple.

Si elles réussissent ce test, les cibles subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} pendant 1 tour.

L'utilisateur subit toujours l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}Ralentissement{/g} mais est invulnérable à l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}.
Les cibles {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchées{/g} par les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g} de l'utilisateur subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} si elles échouent à un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} lié à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −{uip|Check|c9279ededcda42f58f38dda7b6a16946}. Si elles réussissent ce test, les cibles subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} pendant 1 tour.
